name: trak
description: A tracker designed to display and maintain details of content read and/or watched.
author: Nathan Marianovsky

scripts.packageWindows-amd64: echo Compressing Files: && node ./minifier.js && echo Electron-Packager is Creating the EXE File: && npm exec electron-packager . BatHaTransportationApps --platform=win32 --arch=x64
scripts.buildWindows-amd64: echo Compressing Files: && node ./minifier.js && echo Electron-Packager is Creating the EXE File: && npm exec electron-packager . BatHaTransportationApps --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && echo Building the MSI Package: && node build.js -amd64Windows
scripts.buildLinux-amd64: echo Compressing Files: && node ./minifier.js && echo Electron-Packager is Creating the Executable File: && npm exec electron-packager . --platform=linux --arch=x64 && echo Building the Debian Package: && node build.js -amd64Debian
scripts.buildLinux-arm64: echo Compressing Files: && node ./minifier.js && echo Electron-Packager is Creating the Executable File: && npm exec electron-packager . --platform=linux --arch=arm && echo Building the Debian Package: && node build.js -armDebian
